info: Two men are talking about something in a room, and thereâ€™s a pink suitcase in front of them. Then they get a phone call, and one of the leaves the room. The remaining one follows him, and they begin to walk on the street at night. They enter a restaurant and the waiter greet them. The waiter gives them a hug, seems that they are old friends. Then, the recognize a taxi on the road. They rush out of the restaurant and the taxi driver also recognize them and drivers away. The two men begin to run on the street.
